title: Profile
description: You can manage your personal information, goals, and settings here.
personalInfoDescription: Provide accurate personal details to receive tailored fitness and nutrition recommendations.
goalsDescription: Select your primary fitness goal. This will adjust your calorie and macronutrient recommendations.
activityLevelDescription: Select your activity level. This will adjust your calorie and macronutrient recommendations.
nutritionalGoalsDescription: You can set your daily nutritional targets here if you don't like the suggested ones.
nutritionalGoalsWarning: Please notice that changing any of these will override the automatically calculated targets. If you'd like to revert to the suggested targets, you can do so any time by selecting your goal and activity level again.
recommendationsDescription: Here are our recommendations. You can adjust these if you'd like.
makeChangesLink: Want to make changes? Go back

goals.title: Nutritional Goals
goals.description: You can set your daily nutritional targets here if you don't like the suggested ones.
goals.warning: Please notice that changing any of these will override the automatically calculated targets. If you'd like to revert to the suggested targets, you can do so any time by selecting your goal and activity level again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your application settings and preferences.

theme.title: Application Theme
theme.description: Choose between light, dark, or system default theme.
